---
output: html_notebook
title: "Shift Function With Randomly Distributed Data"
---

Load in packages

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
source("Rallfun-v35.txt")
source("rgar_utils.txt")
source("rgar_visualisation.txt")
source("akerd.txt")
source("wilcox_modified.txt")
set.seed(17)

```

Generate randomly distributed data 

```{r}
x <- rnorm(10000)
y <- rnorm(10000)
df <- cbind(x, y)
df2 <- as.data.frame(df)
colnames(df2) <- c("a", "b")

```

Compute and plot the shift function

```{r}
out <- shifthd(df2$a, df2$b, nboot=200)
sf <- plot.sf(data=out)
sf

```
